title: Remove Collection UI from Admin page

requirements.text: Remove the user-facing "Collection" field from the Admin upload form so Admin users cannot see or change any collection value when creating a catalog item.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Upload form no longer renders a "Collection" label/control anywhere on the Admin page.
Submitting the Admin Upload form still succeeds and creates a valid catalog item (no runtime/type errors).
A safe default collection value is applied internally (not shown in UI) so existing catalog data shape continues to work.

requirements.text: Remove the "Collection" column from the Admin catalog table so existing items no longer display collection values on the Admin page.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin catalog table header and rows no longer include a "Collection" column/cells.
The table layout remains usable on mobile/desktop and Actions still work (Remove, etc.).

requirements.text: Update Admin user-facing text so the Admin area contains no visible "Collection" wording after removing the Collection UI.
acceptanceCriteria: No Admin-page labels, headings, helper text, or table headers contain the word "Collection".
All remaining Admin UI text is English-only and still reads clearly.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep best-effort content protection behaviors unchanged (no right-click / no drag) for existing media previews/viewers.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the Public Viewer filtering/organization as part of this change.
Do not introduce backend persistence; continue using existing client-side/localStorage behavior.
